DataElement.preferredName: Person Other Primary Neoplasm Personal Medical History Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not there is a history of other primary cancers.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Other Primary Neoplasm Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A tumor at the original site of origin._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A tumor at the original site of origin.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A tumor at the original site of origin.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
